item.title: Linked Lists Data Structure
item.description: Linked Lists: Understanding and Implementing in Java # Introduction # Linked lists provide a dynamic way of storing and managing data, allowing for automatic growth and shrinkage. Unlike arrays, linked lists consist of nodes, each holding a value and a reference to the next node in the sequence.
